page.title: 02POLICING IN YATE
page.content: There is no police station in Yate because once Chipping Sodbury was bigger than Yate so they put one in Cipping Sodbury.There are 24 policemen who look after Yate.There are 4 policemen on the beat I think they do this to keep an eye on people and check to see if there is any trouble.The biggest crime that happened in Yate recently is a barn that was set on fire by someone and it burnt thousands of pounds worth of straw.The magority of calls are for vandalisom thefts from cars and shop lifters get caught 5 to 10 a week in Yate but many more escape.
